title: Onix-Promotions
author: Onix-Promotions
content: Get ready for a game changer  Euphoric BlissEuphoric Bliss Inc. is an infused pre-roll cannabis corporation & cryptocurrency token. We aim to set the trend for cryptocurrency mass migration, by fusing real world companies & products to provide sustainability to the crypto world and charts.About Euphoric BlissEuphoric Bliss Inc. is an infused pre-roll cannabis company. For those of you that do not know what an infused pre-roll is exactly, it is usually 90% Cannabis and 10% of either “Live Resin”(Dab/Oil), Hash, or THCa. Euphoric Bliss has officially planted their roots in Boston, Massachusetts. We will be collaborating with different breeders & growers in the cannabis industry to create nothing short of the best infused pre-roll on the market! A $1-$3 portion of every product sold at Euphoric Bliss, will be taken and put into our LP. The most established and profitable our business becomes; the more our holders bags will continue to grow. We are pairing with BNB right away at launch and then when our product goes live; we will also pair with Bitcoin/BTC. This will simplify our buying process and eliminate the need for an exchange. Making our buying process that much quicker for those both in & out of crypto. When we open our dispensary, we will be running sales on the most coveted products, where customers both in shop & online will only be able to purchase using Euphoric Bliss. This will in turn get more people into crypto that are currently not. In our dispensary we will have a QR code with our business wallet below a screen with a 1 minute video explaining how to swap into our token for those not familiar with the process. Our office is located at 90 Canal St. Boston, MA 02114.Delivery ServiceOur 2 year plan is to obtain our delivery license in every state in the United States Of America & essentially create the Uber of the cannabis industry. This is extremely useful for any single parents as you cannot purchase cannabis or even pickup an online order with children in the car. Also for those that have social anxiety or maybe the older generation that does not really want to deal with a crowd, this makes things extremely convenient. This will also come in very handy for parties & holidays.THCOur THC product line will start out with our inaugural product the "infused pre-roll". Our product packaging will feature a QR code. This will show you a % breakdown of every single aspect of the plant/matter that are you about to consume. As we grow we look to expand our THC line to include infused drinks & edibles. We will be look to expand to California before 2022 ends. They have a very strong market just like Massachusetts. A lot of infused pre-rolls look quite sloppy. The Euphoric Bliss pre-roll will be a high class, top of the line product.CBDEuphoric Bliss will reveal an exclusive CBD pre-roll for consumers that do not want a psychedelic effect. This will also be beneficial to those that live where THC is not yet legal. Every house in the United States and Canada can receive CBD through the mail! This product line will feature oils, tinctures, drinks & edibles as well. We look to cater to all! CBD allows us to ship worldwide and truly expand our audience. We would love to cater to our European audience to the best of our ability!
